description: With our new HDMI 1x8 Splitter you can take one HDMI source and split it between eight outputs simultaneously, allowing users to view eight duplicates of a single HDMI source. This 1x8 HDMI Splitter provides a high quality digital reproduction with no distortion and is very easy to use. High Quality Construction The HDMI 1x8 Splitter is loaded with the latest advanced technology capable of supporting all your equipment's latest features. This HDMI 1x8 Splitter provides full support for 3D, 1080p resolution, and 24/36 bit deep color. The high quality parts used in this product allow its users to operate at a frequency of 225MHz. The product also has a high quality, heavy-duty metal enclosure that protects all the inside parts and keeps the unit cool by helping with quick heat absorption and dissipation. Applications Our 1x8 HDMI Splitter is perfect for high definition digital signage and video mirroring. With the HDMI Splitter 1x8 you can save some serious time and money. Rather than paying for eight individual video sources you can get one HDMI 1x8 Splitter and only pay for one video source.
title: Sewell Direct SW-29446 8 Port (1x8) v1.3b HDMI Splitter with 3D support
